title: Target Sum
content: You are given a list of non-negative integers, a1, a2, ..., an, and a target, S. Now you have 2 symbols and . For each integer, you should choose one from and as its new symbol. Find out how many ways to assign symbols to make sum of integers equal to target S. The length of the given array is positive and will not exceed 20. The sum of elements in the given array will not exceed 1000. Your output answer is guaranteed to be fitted in a 32-bit integer.
